ygData.subject: RE: CoD and DDD damage.
ygData.msgSnippet: When I got DDD, I ran to shady and maxxed my brass.  Then I tried using it some (DDD) and like all immature songs (ones you just got cuz u just leveled) it
ygData.messageBody:
When I got DDD, I ran to shady and maxxed my brass. Then I tried using it
some (DDD) and like all 'immature' songs (ones you just got cuz u just
leveled) it was not the uber song I was expecting. And then I pretty much
went back to my old standards. And in the course of things, my brass skills
- although listed as 'master' in my stats - fell behind my levels. I was
wondering why screetch with horn was so crappy and it dawned on me that like
my 1HS, 1HB & Piercing, I need to max brass every level or so to keep it
maxed. My singing and string and percussion get maxed in my normal
fighting, etc. I prolly have slacked on wind as I don't invis much any more
- at least not like I used to.

So two points: Yes - lower level songs seem to get stronger as you go up -
even to me at 36. And max those skills every level - brass was one I let
slip and that's prolly why some brass stuff seemed so crappy when I tried
it. (A brass song with crappy brass skill obviously gets resisted more that
a string song with good string skill - duh! And the CoD being more 'mature'
than DDD adds to situation.)

Sylly Songsynger
<Spirit of the Moon>
Bard of the 36th song
somewhere on Innoruuk

p.s. so the jig song saved you about 30 seconds over the course of 5 minutes
of med time. And then you waited another 13 minutes for the spawn. But you
were ready just in case! But if it makes em feel good and you don't have
the level 32 song - do it!

-----Original Message-----
From: Bard [mailto:dabard@...]
Sent: Sunday, November 21, 1999 4:26 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] CoD and DDD damage.

In my camping of the Icy Greaves last week, and last night's
grouping in Kith, taking out high-level undead (the lowest thing con'd gold
to me at 28) I have noticed that although DDD may be more powerful, CoD will
be resisited by higher level creatures MUCH less often. About the only
things that resisted it were red cons that were upper 30's-ish to maybe 40.
Don't take my word for it, try it yourself and see ;o)
